title: Lady Behave! 1937 (Romantic Comedy) American film directed by Lloyd Corrigan

sources.title: Lady Behave! 1937 (Romantic Comedy) American film directed by Lloyd Corrigan
sources.description:
Things go hay-wire when Fate throws them together in a rollicking riot of dizzy romance!
Clarice Kendall Andrews returns home from Mardi Gras with an unexpected announcementâ€”she's married. However, her previous marital entanglements come to light, setting off a chain of comedic events as she tries to sort out her love life while keeping her family oblivious to her romantic mishaps.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/If9aWPnBDYY


Original title: Lady Behave! (1937)
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Lloyd Corrigan
Writers: Joseph Krumgold, Olive Cooper
Stars: Sally Eilers, Neil Hamilton, Joseph Schildkraut 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:28 A chaotic situation unfolds as a young woman unknowingly marries a millionaire and seeks a divorce.
07:01 A comedic tale of mistaken identity and marital schemes involving a woman named Clarice.
12:11 A man is hired to help a family get rid of a woman by pretending to be interested in her, in exchange for money.
17:36 Mischievous siblings try to raise money for their sick sister by involving a wealthy woman in their scheme.
24:41 A chaotic situation unfolds as a woman faints, leading to confusion and a search for a missing person.
29:59 A romantic comedy unfolds with a woman caught in a mistaken identity situation, leading to a proposal and a potential threat of abduction.
37:26 A situation unfolds as family members try to prevent a woman from running away with a man named Andrews.
46:45 A romantic comedy film involving a love triangle and misunderstandings among characters.
48:48 Family drama unfolds as a man's marriage is complicated by his sister-in-law, leading to a potential divorce and legal issues.
